Title: Requires epinephrine devices for anaphylaxis and staff trained to use them at child day care centers
Summary: Requires child day care centers to have epinephrine devices and staff trained to use them on site in case of anaphylaxis or other severe allergic reaction.
LawCode: Ren ยง2500-h to be ยง2500-h-1, amd ยง2500-h-1, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring epinephrine devices for anaphylaxis and staff trained to use them at child day care centers
